author: Steve "Steve"

review: First off, I want to say that this tiny product is not worth the $100.00 plus tax and let me explain why. When I first bought the product, as I love apple macbook Pro's, the device is very limited to 13 products. However, 13 products make much less bloatware on the device. The Box is very shiny and luxurious as it comes to looks. But, When I looked at the 13 products listed, I tried out the movies rentals and the itunes on my computer worked fine in comparison. THe biggest problem is that when I downloaded the product, it did not allow me to watch the movie right away. THe loading time is over 2 hours to watch a movie that is only an hour and 30 minutes long on the lowest settings for internet connections. This was baffling and should not be overlooked. Please save yourself the money and just use your computer to watch movies or a dvd player. In fact, buy a redbox because this product is the least satisfying money I have paid for a long time.Please like my review because of the facts. Thank you.
author: Douglas Quaid

author: Edward Sadler

review: The Apple TV is great for a household like mine where everyone owns Apple products.  Many people have stated how their Apple TV does not work for them.  I had an issue where whenever I would mirror a device, my home's Internet would restart.  That was due to a router setting.  With some research, that setting was tweeked and the Apple TV does everything that it's supposed to.
